#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long h[200001], ans[200001], n, i, j, val, ind;
    ans[0] = 0;
    cin>>n;
    for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
        cin>>h[i];

    for(i = 1; i < n; i++)
    {
        val = 1000000000;
        for(j=1; j<=i; j=j*2)
        {
            ind = i-j;
            val = min(val, ans[ind]+(long long)abs((double)h[i]-(double)h[ind]));
        }
        ans[i] = val;
    }
    cout<<ans[n-1];
    return 0;
}
